titles.title: To amend certain provisions of title 5, United States Code, relating to pay for administrative law judges.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 4/8/1997--Introduced. Amends Federal law concerning government organization and employees to require each time that rates of pay for the General Schedule are adjusted, whether under the annual adjustments to pay schedules or another provision of law in lieu thereof, the rate of basic pay in effect for level IV of the Executive Schedule be adjusted by the same percentage, and as of the same date, as are the rates of pay for the General Schedule.
